Insider Pages Reviews for Mc Donald's
Have experience with this business? Write a Review. ★★★☆☆ Good play area Anonymous 3 Mc Donald's
They have a nice indoor playarea and my 2yrs old daughter loves to play there. There are may seats for parents around the playarea&they keep the place very clean. June 08, 2005 Report Abuse
Was this review helpful to you?
Latest reviews from Citysearch . ★★★★☆ As Good As Any McDonald's by kemeers at Citysearch 4 Mc Donald's November 18, 2006 I try not to eat fatty fast food, but every once in awhile I get a craving for McDonald's. Maybe it stems back to my childhood days when it was a real treat to get a Happy Meal and join other kids in the Playplace, but I think they'll always have me hooked for a meal at least twice a month. I live in Towne Lake so this is the McDonald's I visit. I usually get a hamburger Happy Meal (not much has changed since childhood!) and it tastes consistent with other McD's and is usually always hot/warm and given with a friendly smile. I would have to say McDonald's is my favorite fast food restaurant and the location in TL satisfies my craving every time!
Pros: Hamburger Happy Meal, Diverse Menu, Friendly Service
Cons: Mostly Unhealthy Choices
